verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am resolved no longer to linger, Charmed by the world's delight; Things that are higher, things that are nobler, These have allured my sight.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I will hasten to Him, Hasten so glad and free, Jesus, Greatest, Highest, I will come to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I am resolved to go to the Savior, Leaving my sin and strife; He is the true One, He is the just One, He hath the words of life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I am resolved to follow the Savior, Faithful and true each day; Heed what He sayeth, do what He willeth, He is the living way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I am resolved to enter the Kingdom, Leaving the paths of sin; Friends may oppose me, foes may beset me, Still will I enter in.
